titleStmt.title: An epistle to the people called Quakers emitted by Mr. Robert Rich; who arrived at London from the Barbadoes the ninth day of September, 1679, and departed this life the sixteenth of November following.
titleStmt.author: Rich, Robert, d. 1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: To be sold by Francis Smith,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
